import{transformPropOrder}from'../../render/utils/keys-transform.mjs';const translateAlias={x:"translateX",y:"translateY",z:"translateZ",transformPerspective:"perspective"};function buildTransform(state){let transform="";let transformIsDefault=true;/**
     * Loop over all possible transforms in order, adding the ones that
     * are present to the transform string.
     */for(let i=0;i<transformPropOrder.length;i++){const key=transformPropOrder[i];const value=state.latest[key];if(value===undefined)continue;let valueIsDefault=true;if(typeof value==="number"){valueIsDefault=value===(key.startsWith("scale")?1:0);}else{valueIsDefault=parseFloat(value)===0;}if(!valueIsDefault){transformIsDefault=false;const transformName=translateAlias[key]||key;const valueToRender=state.latest[key];transform+="".concat(transformName,"(").concat(valueToRender,") ");}}return transformIsDefault?"none":transform.trim();}export{buildTransform};
